pages.text: Canadaspis is a hymenocarid which lived during the Cambrian period. It had a carapace covering the legs which it may have used to stir up sediment in order to get at the microbes that it would feed on.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
